name: Snow Ash Land
description: Snow Ash Land will be merciless with you, you must travel and understand a dangerous world with or without your friends, or create a community of players with the many social mechanics, the minimum required for guidance and assistance in a cold and dark universe, learn for yourself how to survive in it, be ready to suffer or run away.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G or Intel CPU Core i3-2100 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video memory Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Intel CPU Core i7-3770 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon RX570 or Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 800 MB available space
